/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the city's daily hustle and bustle. The street is flanked by tall buildings, their facades painted in hues of red and orange, adding a vibrant splash of color to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the warm tones of the buildings. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene.
